sentence.Network_en: Big credits were given to East Germany by successive West German governments.
sentence.Network_cn: 历届西德政府给予东德大量的贷款。

sentence.Network_en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: The river widens considerably as it begins to turn east.
sentence.Network_cn: 河流转向东流时河道大幅度变宽。

means.word_mean: 1. a resident of the east side of Manhattan in New York City
